title: T-shirt, "Colors: A Magazine About the Rest of the World, English"
creditline: Gift of Tibor Kalman/ M & co.
description: Recto: The black t-shirt is imprinted in the upper half with a semi-circular design in green of the slogan, a magazine about the rest of the world. COLOR is imprinted across the center, with the R in a reversed, upside-down position; the S of Colors is in a sideways position, directly beneath the L in Color. Verso: The slogan, in English, French, German, Italian, Spanish and Korean, is imprinted in green and yellow in a neo-Constructivist typographic format.

tombstone.epitaph:
T-shirt, "Colors: A Magazine About the Rest of the World, English".
Gift of Tibor Kalman/ M & co.. 1993-151-438.
